attributes.additional_details:
To cancel the exams fully as some colleges are currently having them. 
Move the exams to a later date so we are safe.
Lower the grade boundary.
Let them stay at home and continue with online lessons and coursework.
attributes.background:
Many college students are putting their life at risk by attending these exams this month. They are not only putting themselves at risk of Covid but also their loved ones. If A-levels and GSCE can be cancelled so can BTEC exams. 
BTEC Students are not immune to corona virus and should stay at home.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Allow teacher predicted grades for BTEC students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548778

Cancel Vocational Exams NOW: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565615
